You may ask what does it have to do rock music of a second class musician with Nobel prize for literature.
Not very much but it doesn't matter. What had Obama's killing and torture of over one million people in Irak, Afghanistan, Syria and Libya to do with Nobel prize for peace ? Simply he worked for Jews and was rewarded.
Bob Dylan (Hebrew name: Shabtai Zisel ben Avraham)  was born as Robert Allen Zimmerman and raised Jewish in Wisconsin, Dylan has maintained Israel ties throughout his life.). 
He was Jew and he hated Gentile.
Is this not enough to get Nobel prize and one million $?
But how genial. Why should the Jews pay for their mercenaries from their own pocket if they can bribe the Nobel Committee for less and save the money.
